data.text:
"Please, leave me alone. I'm miserable!"

â€•Gervaise[src]

Gervaise is a Redguard clothier who resides in the city of Daggerfall. She can be found west of the Daggerfall Cathedral. Gervaise appears to be in a state of duress.

Trivia[]

Despite being a Redguard, she has a very Breton-sounding name hinting at a multi-race relationship between her parents.

This character is a "Clothier" class character. However, as they are not a merchant clothier, no items can be bought or sold from them.

Appearances[]

The Elder Scrolls Online
